results.title: Marketing Representative
results.description: Job Description Job Description Anchor Management Group has recently acquired several new clients and expanded to new locations surrounding the Buffalo area. With our recent acquisition we are looking to fill 3 entry level brand marketing associate positions within our firm in order to help with brand awareness, product launches to the consumer market, as well as handling new customer acquisition. The people we are looking to fill these roles should be looking to get their foot in the door to b…

Job Description The Richards Group | Quadratic (Dallas, TX) Do you have a marketing, advertising, or communications degree? Are you equally left- and right-brained? Do you stand out in a crowd? Do you want to work for the largest independent advertising agency in the United States? If you answered yes to any of these questions, then good news–we’re hiring. The Richards Group’s direct response and analytics division, Quadratic, is looking for smart, energetic, hardworking, and proactive college …

results.description: Job Description Professional V.I.P Cleaning Services, LLC is a new and upcoming residential and commercial cleaning company. results.title: Promotional Marketing Manager
results.description: Job Description About the Company: Budtrader.com is the largest Medical Marijuana Marketplace in the United States. We currently have over 850,000 registered users and over 10,000,000 monthly visitors. We have built a beautiful "High Tech" campus in San Diego. We are looking to add a few talented hard working individuals to our team. Job Description: Promotional Marketing Manager will manage a team of promotional models. Promotional team will attend Cannabis expos, trade shows, night club openi…

Job Description We are an up and coming event marketing agency looking for 3-5 energetic, Entry Level Business Marketing Assistants to join our growing team. This individual will support the agency’s business development efforts including planning promotional events for various clientele, preparation for client pitches and events, as well as execution of various on site events in the area. In addition, this person will also support our Communications team. The individual we are looking for must…
results.title: Business Marketing Assistant (Entry Level)
Event Planning & Marketing Coordination
results.description: Job Description We are one of the leading Event Promotions and Event Planning firms in Cincinnati. Our diverse client portfolio includes market development and events with industry leaders in skincare & cosmetics, health & wellness, and gourmet foods. We are looking for innovative, team-oriented individuals who enjoy working with others and maintaining relationships with our prestigious clientele. Marketing, Advertising and Special Event experience is not required, but the passion to learn is r…

results.title: Sales & Marketing Manager - Medical Devices

results.description: Job Description Team Lead | Sales & Marketing | Full Time | Entry Level Looking to join a company who values a "Work Hard, Play Hard" philosophy? We thought so. Entry Level Team Lead Responsibilities : Serves customers by selling products; meeting customer needs; team development/training This is a manager-in-training position. You will start entry level and move into management. Entry Level Job Duties : Services accounts, obtains orders, and establishes new accounts by planning and organizing …

results.title: Junior Marketing Associate-Marketing, Advertising & Communications
results.description: Job Description Junior Marketing Associate-Marketing, Advertising & Communications Begin an Exciting Career TODAY We are seeking a Junior Marketing Associate for a premier firm providing marketing, advertising and consulting services to large corporations on local and national levels. This position would work closely with Marketing Specialists to identify and develop new streams of revenue for the assigned campaign through UNIQUE advertising strategies including sales, promotions, and innovativ…

results.title: Marketing Assistant - Community Relations
results.description: Job Description Peak Enterprises is hiring a Marketing Assistant to support our rapidly growing marketing and sales team. We are looking for an individual that has amazing leadership skills, a dynamic personality that can run a team, make great connections, and have an impact in the community. We provide training in professional representation and mentorship. We Provide Training In: Mentoring others Professional Representation Community Outreach Building connections with participants Organizati…

results.title: Sports Minded Marketing Representatives
results.description: Job Description Sports Minded Marketing Representatives Are you sports minded and driven? Are you bored every day at work? Are you looking for excitement? Peak Enterprises Corp. is one of the leading sales and marketing firms in Atlanta and currently we are focusing on expanding our telecommunications advertising campaigns. We are looking for sports minded marketing representatives to train on the basics of sales and promotions in order to expand our client reach locally. Our goal is train a ma…

results.title: Customer Relations Representative (Entry Level)
results.description: Job Description Momentum is one of the fastest and most successful start up marketing and advertising firms in the area and we are currently going through a nationwide expansion. We are hiring entry level and experienced public relation, marketing, and retail representatives. Our firm provides exceptional customer service and continually develops new marketing campaigns for our high profile clients that deal with mainly the beauty/cosmetics, health/wellness, gourmet food, & household industries…
